Name: The Bizarre Brothers
Description: You helped the three brothers with their respective troubles, and they want to thank you in person.
QuestDesc: You helped the three brothers with their respective troubles, and they want to thank you in person.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Awesome, you're still here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We were just chatting and realized you've actually lent a hand to all three of us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratello
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah! You are on fire! No wonder you're the strongest in the world!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellino
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much!

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, I need more than just compliments.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such modesty! Joining the Pioneer Association is a dream come true, and you've helped us so much! We'll thank you properly for sure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! Joining the Pioneer Association is a dream come true, and you've helped us so much! We'll thank you properly for sure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratello
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The strongest deserves the finest! We'll give you something blazing!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellino
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hear hear! We're planning to commission a statue in your honor, and it will be placed right here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, hit us with your coolest pose!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, I've got the picture! We'll send it to the sculptor. Come back in a few days, and you'll see your exclusive statue!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah... here you are. L-look at the "statue" we prepared for you! Hahaha...

Options.PlotLineKey: This isn't a statue at all.
This isn't the pose I struck.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was supposed to be a statue, but, well, something went a little wrong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After the stone arrived, I was worried someone would steal it, so I stayed here and had Fratello deliver your portrait to the sculptor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratello
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right. I almost ran my life out delivering it, and then... I got lost! Haha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellino
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I figured Fratello was lost when he didn't come back, so I grabbed the backup portrait and went to find the sculptor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellino
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I dropped the portrait somewhere along the way...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I got really worried waiting around, so I decided to go looking for them. But I couldn't leave the stone behind, so I carried it with me, and in the end, I tripped and the stone fell off a cliff...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the stone gone, we had no choice but to use the commission fee to buy a projector and display your pose here instead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratello
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's actually not that bad, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellino
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, it does match the vibe of the town!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for being understanding, haha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, we spent all of our savings on this, so making a new statue might be a bit too much to handle...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratello
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or maybe we should put our plan to join the Pioneer Association on hold for now and focus on saving up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellino
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If everything goes smoothly, we should have enough money in three or four years to build your statue!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's not necessary...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for your understanding, haha.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, if you'll excuse us, we're heading off to the Association. Till we meet again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fratellone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah... here you are. L-look at the "statue" we prepared for you! Hahaha...
